name: Nurse Joy (Local)
description: I am a local heuristic translator.
system_prompt: You are a search index. Return the matching canonical terms.

data.description: Sensation that causes the desire or reflex to scratch.
Change in the color or texture of the skin.
Bumps or nodules on the skin.
Pain in the stomach or abdomen.
Heartburn or acid reflux.
Ejecting matter from the stomach through the mouth.
Expelling air from the lungs with a sudden sharp sound.
Pain in the chest region.
Yellow discoloration of the skin (Jaundice).
A feeling of sickness with an inclination to vomit.
Reduced desire to eat.
Pain in the belly area.
Burning sensation during urination.
Small amounts of urine leakage.
Elevated body temperature.
Extreme tiredness resulting from mental or physical exertion or illness.
Decrease in body weight.
Inability to rest or relax.
A lack of energy and enthusiasm.
Fluctuating blood glucose levels.
Unclear or warped sight.
Excessive body fat.
Feeling unusually hungry.
Loose, watery stools.
Difficulty breathing or shortness of breath.
Pain in the head.
Sensation of spinning or losing balance.
Pain and difficulty moving the neck.
Persistent feeling of sadness and loss of interest.
Feeling agitated or easily annoyed.
Pain in the muscles.
Pain in the joints.
Enlarged lymph nodes.
General feeling of discomfort or illness.
Red spots appearing on the skin.
Excess nasal drainage, often associated with the common cold.
Blocked nasal passages, stuffy nose, common in cold.
Sudden expulsion of air from nose and mouth, common in cold.
Feeling of coldness and shivering, often with fever or cold.
Sore, scratchy, or irritated throat, common in cold.
